content.rendered:
On 31st October, 2015 students from the STeP Center Janhit Society for Social Welfare went to Metro Mall at Seelampur in Delhi.

Total of 34 students along with 2 teachers from the center were present during the exposure visit. HR manager, Mr. Praveen Kumar, Metro Mall shared the skill of managing customer. He also gave some important facts of Sales.

During the exposure visit, students asked several queries related to sales and retail sector. At the end of the visit students were very motivated and learned many new things through this visit and look forward to get an employment in this sector.
